question: What is the theme of the 2020 World Autism Awareness Day?
explanation:
Every year, the 2nd day of April has been observed as the World Autism Awareness Day, across the world. 
According to the United Nations, the theme of the 2020 World Autism Awareness Day is \"The Transition to Adulthood\". The UN Secretary General Ant√≥nio Guterres announced that the rights of persons with autism must be taken into account in all responses to the COVID-19 pandemic.
